Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: m3r1 "m3r1"
Reviews.Content: We researched this camera for over 3 months and used the reviews on Amazon and various websites to make our decision. We specifically chose a bundle from Focus Camera through Amazon based on those reviews. We are very pleased with our purchase. The shipping took a little longer than expected, but we received it on Christmas Eve (ordered on Dec 18th), so just in time.In hindsight, we probably would pick a different bundle that included the extra battery. The bundle items are very good and the small soft case is perfect. We thought we wanted the hard case in addition to the soft, but not really, and that is the only reason we would chose a different bundle. You cannot go wrong with this camera, Focus Camera and their bundle choices.

Reviews.Title: Smart camera
Reviews.Author: Tash Tashima
Reviews.Content: This camera is smarter than me. She does more than I expected. Only using micro HDMI is my concern but not a big problem.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: zhaohe song
Reviews.Content: It is a great product. The only problem is there is a big bubble in the middle of the screen protector.
